snippet.title: Sokoban Land DX - Steam Greenlight Trailer - Windows PC
snippet.description:
A puzzle (Sokoban) game for 1 or 2 players (local co-op). This trailer is dedicated to Sokoban Land DX Steam Greenlight version for PC (Windows). It's a evolution of Sokoban Land original released for Android, now with local co-op game mode, better support for gamepads (built and tested with Xbox 360 controller) and keyboards and several minor improvements over original version.

This game was accepted on Steam Greenlight, thank you for voting on it! Steam Store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/670850/Sokoban_Land_DX/

Thanks for watching :)
